ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "k1": typeOf("manju"), "k2": typeOf(1), "k3": typeOf([]), "k4": typeOf({}), "k5": typeOf(false), "k6": typeOf(Null), "k7": typeOf(null), }

%dw 2.0 output application/json /* * [0] "INDIA" [-4] * [1] "CHINA" [-3] * [2] "GERMANY" [-2] * [3] "MALAYSIA" [-1] */ --- { /* The below 2 are index K1 and K2 value selector which * can have both positive and negative values */ "K1": payload[3], "K2": payload[-1], "K3": payload[2 to 3], "K4": payload[-1 to -2] }
